        EM.DatalayerManager.push(EM.datalayer);
    }

                        "action":"detail",
                        "list":"Product page"
                    }
                }
            },"dish": [{"name":"DC","common_key":""}]    });EM.DatalayerManager.push({
            'sd': "Yes",
            'pr': "Yes",
            '2h': "No",
        });</script>
<!-- Google Tag Manager -->

height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>

new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],

        <div class="adBanner" style="background-color: transparent; height: 1px; width: 1px;"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
window.user_labels = [];

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
    //run ab here, ex: runAb(12);
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">    
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        var voucherData = PH.cookie.get("voucher_notification");                
        if (voucherData){            
            try{
                voucherData = decodeURIComponent(voucherData).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
                voucherData = JSON.parse(voucherData);

                if (voucherData.id && EM.show_voucher_notification_in_page) {
                    EM.AdminNotificationsManager.disableNotificationForShown(voucherData.id);
                }

                var voucherNotificationMsg = voucherData.message,
                    notificationName = voucherData.name;
                
                new EM.Notification({
                    position: 'top right',
                    message : voucherNotificationMsg,
                    icon: 'em em-voucher',
                    ttl: false,
                    className: 'voucher-response-notification',
                    onOpen: function(e){
                        var trackingString = "";
                        if (voucherData.id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.id+'_';
                        }
                        if (voucherData.campaign_id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.campaign_id+'_';
                        }
                        if (notificationName){
                            trackingString += notificationName;
                        }
                        dataLayer.push({event: 'voucher_tooltip_click', ec: "ToolTip", ea: "campanie_"+trackingString, el: "Display campanie_" + trackingString});                        
                    }
                });

                PH.cookie.set('voucher_notification','',-1,'/',window.cookie_domain || EM.cookie_domain);
            }catch(e){
            }
        }        
    })
</script>
        </div>
    </div>

        <ul class="product-delivery-options list-unstyled mrg-sep-none"><li><p><i class="em em-gift"></i> <strong>11 puncte</strong> prin cardul eMAG-Raiffeisen        <a class="details-link" target="_blank" href="/card-emag?ref=loyaltypoints-productpage-v2">detalii</a></p></li>                    <li>

                                    <li>
                        <p>
                            <i class="em em-return-30"></i> Retur gratuit in 30 de zile <a href="https://www.emag.ro/info/30-de-zile-drept-de-retur?ref=pd_return30days_benefit" target="_blank">detalii</a></p>
                    </li>
                                <li class="hide benefits-warranty-elem" id="js-benefits-warranty">
                    <p><i class="em em-warranty"></i> Garantie inclusa: <a href="/info/garantia-produselor" target="_blank" class="details-link">detalii</a></p>
                    <ul>                                                                                                    <li>
                                Persoane fizice:

        <section class="page-section page-section-light gtm_product-page-description">
    <a id="description-section" class="scroll-anchor"></a>
    <div class="container pad-btm-lg">
        <h2 class="page-section-title">
            Descriere        </h2>
        <div class="product-page-description description-banner-right"><div class="product-page-description-text"><div class="collapse-offset" id="description-body" style="overflow-y: hidden; height: 250px;">Apple Watch 3, GPS, Carcasa Silver Aluminium 42mm, White Sport Band
		
				 
		
				
		
				
					Atinge noi recorduri
				
					<br>
					Antrenor personal inteligent. Aplicatie Ritm cardiac imbunatatita. Playlisturile tale favorite la indemana ta. Altimetru incorporat.
				
					Iti prezentam Apple Watch Series 3. Acum poti fi mai activ, mai motivat si mai conectat ca oricand.
			
		
				 
		
				
		
				
					Cel mai avansat ceas sport
				
					<br>
					Antrenamente la un nivel superior.
			
		
				 
		
				
			
				
					GPS si altimetru
				
					 
				
					Mai departe, mai sus.
			
		
				
			
				
					Muzica
				
					 
				
					Mai motivat, cu playlistul preferat.
			
		
				
			
				
					Adecvat pentru inot
				
					 
				
					Ia-l cu tine in piscina. Sau in mare.
			
		
				
			
				
					Aplicatia Antrenament
				
					 
				
					Monitorizeaza tot. De la o plimbare pana la un sprint cu bicicleta.
			
		
				 
			
				 
		
				
		
				
					Tracker inteligent de activitate
				
					<br>
					Trei cercuri. Un singur obiectiv.
			
		
				 
			
				 
		
				
			
				
					Misca-te, exerseaza, stai in picioare
				
					 
				
					Inchide cercurile provocarilor zilnice.
			
		
				
			
				
					Sfaturi inteligente de antrenament
				
					 
				
					Cand ai nevoie de un imbold sa mergi inainte.
			
		
				
			
				
					Partajarea activitatii
				
					 
				
					Prietenul la nevoie se motiveaza.
			
		
				
			
				
					Trofee
				
					 
				
					Apple Watch face din fiecare realizare o sarbatoare.
			
		
				 
			
				 
		
				
		
				
					Instrument performant de sanatate
				
					<br>
					Nu lasa mintea sa uite de corp.
			
		
				 
			
				 
		
				
			
				
					Aplicatia Ritm cardiac
				
					 
				
					Tine un ochi pe pulsul tau. Fie ca te odihnesti, mergi sau ai terminat antrenamentul.
			
		
				
			
				
					Aplicatia Respira
				
					 
				
					Linisteste-ti mintea. Relaxeaza-ti corpul.
			
		
				
			
				
					Aplicatii de sanatate terte
				
					 
				
					Bei mai multa apa. Dormi mai bine. Esti mai sanatos.
			
		
				
			
				
					Aplicatia Sanatate pe iPhone
				
					 
				
					Ai toate datele despre sanatatea si antrenamentele tale.
			
		
				 
			
				 
		
				
		
				
					Asistent zilnic
				
					<br>
					Planifica-ti intreaga zi. Din incheietura.
			
		
				 
			
				 
		
				
			
				
					Apeluri si mesaje
				
					 
				
					Trimiti mesaje, apelezi si primesti invitatii la intalniri.
			
		
				
			
				
					Aplicatii si notificari
				
					 
				
					Nu-ti scapa nimic.
			
		
				
			
				
					Cadrane de ceas
				
					 
				
					O multime de cadrane. Toate personalizabile.
			
		
				 
			
				 
		
				
		
				Alege un model. Adauga o curea. Fa-l sa fie al tau.</div>
                        <div class="text-left collapse-button-inside">

                        </div></div>    <div class="product-page-description-ad hidden-xs">

		</tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="width:800px;text-align:center;">
				 </td>
		</tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="width:800px;text-align:center;">

		</tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="width:800px;text-align:center;">

				<p>
					<br />
					Antrenor personal inteligent. Aplicatie Ritm cardiac imbunatatita. Playlisturile tale favorite la indemana ta. Altimetru incorporat.</p>
				<p>
					Iti prezentam <b>Apple Watch Series 3</b>. Acum poti fi mai activ, mai motivat si mai conectat ca oricand.</p>
			</td>

                <section class="page-section page-section-light gtm_product-page-specs">
    <a id="specification-section" class="scroll-anchor"></a>
    <div class="container pad-btm-lg">
        <h2 class="page-section-title">Specificatii</h2>
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-md-12">

    <hr>
    <p>Brand: <a href="/brands/brand/apple">Apple</a></p><p>Pretul produsului include costul de 0.2 lei aferent colectarii, tratarii si eliminarii DEEE.</p><p>eMAG.ro face eforturi permanente pentru a păstra acurateţea informaţiilor din acestă pagină. Rareori acestea pot conţine inadvertenţe: fotografia are caracter informativ şi poate conţine accesorii neincluse în pachetele standard, unele specificaţii pot fi modificate de catre producător fără preaviz sau pot conţine erori de operare. Toate promoţiile prezente în site sunt valabile în limita stocului.</p></div>

</div><div class="product-review-item js-review-item row" data-id="2593259" data-product-pnk="DZM1XVBBM" data-product-sef-name="apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-38mm-black-sport-band-mtf02mp-a">
    <div class="col-md-2"><div class="product-review-head"><div class="product-review-user-avatar">
                    <a href="/product-feedback/user-profile/9d4aba2c2c1ffc732b89a87ac6c32b4b4850203032"><div class="user-avatar user-avatar-sm"><div class="thumbnail" style="background-color: #673ab7"><span class="ini">CC</span>
            <div class="picture" data-background-image="https://graph.facebook.com/1338942882837775/picture?width=78&amp;height=78&amp;date=20200121150117"></div></div>
    </div></a>
                </div>
                <div class="product-review-user-meta">
                    <p class="product-review-author mrg-top-xs semibold">Codrut Ceaureanu</p>
                    <p class="small text-muted mrg-sep-none">28 Iun 2019</p><div class="small text-muted mrg-sep-none">
            <span class="review-written-for">Review scris pentru varianta</span>                <span class="label label-neutral">Negru</span>
                            <span class="label label-neutral">38 mm</span>
            </div></div></div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-10">
        <div class="product-review-body"><h3 class="product-review-title"><a href="/product-feedback/apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-38mm-black-sport-band-mtf02mp-a/pd/DZM1XVBBM/review/2593259">Excelent</a></h3>
            <div class="star-rating-container mrg-btm-xs">
                <div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-5  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 100%"></div>
    </div><p class="mrg-top-xs font-size-sm text-muted verified-order" data-ph-content="Produs cumparat de la eMAG sau de la un partener certificat eMAG Marketplace" data-ph-align="SW NW" data-phino="Dropdown">
            <i class="em em-verified text-success"></i> <span class="semibold">Achizitie verificata</span>
        </p></div>
            <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-2593259">Un ceas excelent. Bun pentru oamenii ce primesc multe notificari sau vor sa iti faca tracking la activitatile sportive. Pentru cineva care are tot timpul telefonul la un metru distanta si nu vrea sa vada tot felul de statistici despre cum te misti e useless si enervant. Acum ca a fost introdus Apple Pay te poti duce doar cu ceasul la magazin si va functiona sa platesti( ceasul clonandu-ti cardul prin Apple pay-- nu ai nevoie de conectare wi-fi sau celular ca sa mearga si nici de telefon langa tine).</div></div>

        <div class="review-meta-area pad-sep-xs">
                <span class="review-meta">
                    <a href="#" role="button" class="vote-feedback-btn js-vote-review no-underline gtm_prod_page_reviews_useful_rev">

                        <span class="vote-review-text">12</span>

                        <i class="em em-vote-on font-size-lg"></i>
                        <span class="vote-review-text">12</span>
                    </a>
                </span>

    <div class="col-md-2"><div class="product-review-head"><div class="product-review-user-avatar">
                    <a href="/product-feedback/user-profile/27fa31a9d833f46fa6087c3324131b5d1699340032"><div class="user-avatar user-avatar-sm"><div class="thumbnail" style="background-color: #999999"><span class="ini">RS</span>
            </div>
    </div></a>
                </div>
                <div class="product-review-user-meta">
                    <p class="product-review-author mrg-top-xs semibold">Radulescu Sever</p>
                    <p class="small text-muted mrg-sep-none">20 Ian 2020</p><div class="small text-muted mrg-sep-none">
            <span class="review-written-for">Review scris pentru varianta</span>                <span class="label label-neutral">Negru</span>
                            <span class="label label-neutral">38 mm</span>
            </div></div></div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-10">
        <div class="product-review-body"><h3 class="product-review-title"><a href="/product-feedback/apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-38mm-black-sport-band-mtf02mp-a/pd/DZM1XVBBM/review/3172535">Excelent</a></h3>
            <div class="star-rating-container mrg-btm-xs">
                <div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-5  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 100%"></div>
    </div><p class="mrg-top-xs font-size-sm text-muted verified-order" data-ph-content="Produs cumparat de la eMAG sau de la un partener certificat eMAG Marketplace" data-ph-align="SW NW" data-phino="Dropdown">
            <i class="em em-verified text-success"></i> <span class="semibold">Achizitie verificata</span>
        </p></div>
            <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-3172535">Ceasul este extraordinar, livrarea ok, prețul ok! Însă ATENȚIE, NU FUNCȚIONEAZĂ DECÂT CU IPHONE 6S si ulterioarele sau altfel si corect spus DOAR CU IOS 13 sau superior. Inclusiv pe site-ul Apple au fost neconcordante cu privire la acest aspect având in vedere ca ceasul a apărut înainte de iOS 13!! Chiar daca este un model mai vechi ceasul cere sa instalezi watchOS 6 sau superior! Desi am atras atenția celor de la EMAG cu privire la acest aspect văd ca prezentarea produsului este tot ambigua fără a se specifica clar cele menționate mai sus!</div></div>

    <div class="col-md-10">
        <div class="product-review-body"><h3 class="product-review-title"><a href="/product-feedback/apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-42mm-black-sport-band-mtf32mp-a/pd/DQM1XVBBM/review/2602024">Recomand</a></h3>
            <div class="star-rating-container mrg-btm-xs">
                <div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-5  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 100%"></div>
    </div></div>
            <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-2602024">Am fost sceptic în privința acestui smart watch. Am tot studiat. Am vrut Garmin Fenix 5, dar mi s-a părut totuși mult. Pe acesta l-am luat resigilat, având iphone. Este perfect prin asociere. Singurul inconvenient este autonomia: aproape 48 de ore.</div></div>

</div><div class="product-review-item js-review-item row" data-id="2933164" data-product-pnk="DZM1XVBBM" data-product-sef-name="apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-38mm-black-sport-band-mtf02mp-a">
    <div class="col-md-2"><div class="product-review-head"><div class="product-review-user-avatar">
                    <a href="/product-feedback/user-profile/829e50aa382f9267266277fa57860f692069448032"><div class="user-avatar user-avatar-sm"><div class="thumbnail" style="background-color: #f1b708"><span class="ini">DC</span>
            </div>
    </div></a>
                </div>
                <div class="product-review-user-meta">
                    <p class="product-review-author mrg-top-xs semibold">Dumitru Cristina</p>
                    <p class="small text-muted mrg-sep-none">16 Noi 2019</p><div class="small text-muted mrg-sep-none">
            <span class="review-written-for">Review scris pentru varianta</span>                <span class="label label-neutral">Negru</span>
                            <span class="label label-neutral">38 mm</span>
            </div></div></div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-10">
        <div class="product-review-body"><h3 class="product-review-title"><a href="/product-feedback/apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-38mm-black-sport-band-mtf02mp-a/pd/DZM1XVBBM/review/2933164">Bun, DAR</a></h3>
            <div class="star-rating-container mrg-btm-xs">
                <div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-3  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 60%"></div>
    </div><p class="mrg-top-xs font-size-sm text-muted verified-order" data-ph-content="Produs cumparat de la eMAG sau de la un partener certificat eMAG Marketplace" data-ph-align="SW NW" data-phino="Dropdown">
            <i class="em em-verified text-success"></i> <span class="semibold">Achizitie verificata</span>
        </p></div>
            <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-2933164">Este un ceas excelent, insa trebuie sa ai si noroc la produsul propriu-zis. Il detin de o zi si imediat ce am inceput sa ma ‘joc’ cu el, am observat cateva inconveniente (mici si mari). Cand umblu la setari in sus si in jos, fiecare rand lasa, in urma lui, purple trails (nu stiu cum sa zic in romana... Niste urme mov). I-am facut update la 6.1 (aprox trei ore a durat), dar urmele persista. Nu sunt extrem de deranjante, insa nu stiu daca il afecteaza pe termen lung. Bara de vorbire de la Siri are lag (din ce am observat, comparand cu videoclipurile de pe youtube) si uneori decide ca vrea sa imi arate ceasul in timp ce raspund la mesaje. Am mai gasit cateva persoane cu aceeasi problema. Cred ca este vorba despre optimizare. In rest, se misca bine, raspunde la comenzi si se aude cum trebuie. Voi contacta persoanele competente pentru a vedea ce este de facut.</div></div>

        <div class="review-meta-area pad-sep-xs">
                <span class="review-meta">
                    <a href="#" role="button" class="vote-feedback-btn js-vote-review no-underline gtm_prod_page_reviews_useful_rev">

        <div class="product-review-body"><h3 class="product-review-title"><a href="/product-feedback/apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-38mm-black-sport-band-mtf02mp-a/pd/DZM1XVBBM/review/3026920">Foarte multumit</a></h3>
            <div class="star-rating-container mrg-btm-xs">
                <div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-5  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 100%"></div>
    </div></div>
            <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-3026920">Model de 42mm<br> Recomand.<br> Nu e mare diferenta intre 3 si 4. Nu dati banii pe modelele mai noi, nu merita diferenta de bani.<br> Un Apple Watch care face tot ce face unul mai nou.</div></div>

    <div class="col-md-10">
        <div class="product-review-body"><h3 class="product-review-title"><a href="/product-feedback/apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-42mm-black-sport-band-mtf32mp-a/pd/DQM1XVBBM/review/2293975">Super!</a></h3>
            <div class="star-rating-container mrg-btm-xs">
                <div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-5  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 100%"></div>
    </div><p class="mrg-top-xs font-size-sm text-muted verified-order" data-ph-content="Produs cumparat de la eMAG sau de la un partener certificat eMAG Marketplace" data-ph-align="SW NW" data-phino="Dropdown">
            <i class="em em-verified text-success"></i> <span class="semibold">Achizitie verificata</span>
        </p></div>
            <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-2293975">Merita si se comporta peste asteptari.</div></div>

        <div class="review-meta-area pad-sep-xs">

</div><div class="js-question-item question-item" data-id="3329608" data-product-pnk="DZM1XVBBM" data-product-sef-name="apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-38mm-black-sport-band-mtf02mp-a" data-user-id="7042513">

            <div class="picture" data-background-image="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/avatars/1585499409_7042513_78x78_6157.png"></div></div>

        <div class="question-item-meta text-muted small">

    <div class="question-item-content">
        <div class="js-question-row" data-user-id="7042513"><h2 class="js-view-only font-size-md font-semi-bold question-title"><a href="/product-feedback/apple-watch-3-gps-carcasa-space-grey-aluminium-38mm-black-sport-band-mtf02mp-a/pd/DZM1XVBBM/question/3329608"><span class="js-question-content">Este compatibil cu Samsung?</span></a>                <small><a class="hidden small js-edit-area" href="#">Editează</a></small>

        <p class="js-view-only">
            <span class="js-answer-content">Bună Andrei, ceasurile Apple sunt compatibile doar cu telefoanele iPhone, începând cu iPhone 6S sau mai nou având iOS 13 sau mai nou.</span>
            <a class="hidden small js-edit-area" href="#">Editează</a>

            <span class="js-answer-content">Bună Sara, Apple Watch Seria 3 a fost lansat in anul 2017. Pentru mai multe informații poți accesa link-ul următor: <a href="http://www.apple.com/ro/apple-watch-series-3/" target="_blank">apple.com/ro/apple-watch-series-3/</a></span>

            <section class="page-section page-section-light" id="seo-links">
        <div class="container">
            <h2 class="page-section-title">Linkuri utile:</h2>
            <div class="pad-sep-xs">
                <div class="collapse-offset" id="seo-links-body" style="overflow-y: hidden; height: 150px;">

                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="http://www.anpc.gov.ro/?ref=footer_3_5" class="footer-link" title="ANPC">ANPC</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://anpc.ro/categorie/1271/sal?ref=footer_3_6" class="footer-link" title="ANPC - SAL">ANPC - SAL</a></li>
                                                                                </ul>
                    </div>
                                                                                <div class="col-sm-3 js-footer-group">
                        <a href="#footer_services-4" class="ph-widget ph-collapse-one footer-head js-footer-head collapse-disabled" data-phino="CollapseOne" data-ph-target="#footer_services-4" tabindex="0">eMAG.ro</a>
                        <ul id="footer_services-4" class="footer-body collapse" style="overflow-y: hidden;">
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://marketplace-leads.emag.ro?utm_source=eMAG.ro&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=footer?ref=footer_4_1" class="footer-link" title="Vreau sa vand pe eMAG">Vreau sa vand pe eMAG</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="/info/termeni-si-conditii?ref=footer_4_2" class="footer-link" title="Termeni si conditii">Termeni si conditii</a></li>

                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="/info/politica-de-utilizare-cookie-uri?ref=footer_4_4" class="footer-link" title="Politica de utilizare Cookie-uri">Politica de utilizare Cookie-uri</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/main/index.cfm?event=main.home2.show&amp;lng=RO?ref=footer_4_5" class="footer-link" title="Solutionarea Online a litigiilor">Solutionarea Online a litigiilor</a></li>

                    </div>
                                                                                </div>
    </div>
</div>
